name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a large pan, cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then quickly mix in egg mixture.
Add pasta water if needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir fry for 30 seconds.
Add mixed vegetables and stir fry for 3-5 minutes until crisp-tender.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, toss to combine.
